imdb.plot outline: Real ghost stories from California, told by real people at the real places. Episodes feature several famous Spooky Places known to be haunted. Featuring The Queen Mary ship, docked in Long Beach, The USS Hornet WWII aircraft carrier docked in Alameda, A San Francisco Ghost Tour, The Winchester Mystery House in San Jose, and Alcatraz Island, the famous prison in The Bay Area.
imdb.title: Beyond the Grave
